channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Hidden Ties Between Google and Amazon’s Project Nimbus and Israel's Military
item.description: A WIRED investigation found public statements from officials detail a much closer link between Project Nimbus and Israel Defense Forces than previousl...

item.title: How VanMoof’s new owners plan to win over its old customers
item.description: When VanMoof declared bankruptcy last year, it left around 5,000 customers who had pre-ordered e-bikes in the lurch. Now VanMoof is up and running und...

item.title: Influencers Are Racing to Profit From the Trump Shooting
item.description: Niche celebrities and right-wing activists are already hawking merchandise featuring the image of a bloodied Donald Trump raising his fist in the air.

item.title: Mitti Labs aims to make rice farming less harmful to the climate, starting in India
item.description: Mitti Labs aims to transform rice farming in India and other South Asian markets by reducing methane emissions by 50% and water consumption by 30%. © ...

item.title: Far-Right Extremists Call for Violence and War After Trump Shooting
item.description: "They should all be hung in the streets," one person wrote of Democrats, the media, and others. "War now," another wrote.

item.title: How to tell if your online accounts have been hacked
item.description: This is a guide on how to check whether someone compromised your online accounts. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Trump Shooting Conspiracies Are Coming From Every Direction
